properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a coupon

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a coupon

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many coupons

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a coupon

properties.name: couponType
properties.description: Either product (valid for specified products or subscription plans) or checkout (valid for any checkout)

properties.name: productIds
properties.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: discountType
properties.description: Either flat or percentage

properties.name: discountAmount
properties.description: Discount amount in currency

properties.name: discountAmount
properties.description: Discount amount in percentage

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Attributes in JSON form

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Number of times a coupon can be used in a checkout. This will be set to 999,999 by default, if not specified.

options.name: allowedUses
options.description: Number of times a coupon can be used in a checkout. This will be set to 999,999 by default, if not specified.

options.name: couponCode
options.description: Will be randomly generated if not specified

options.name: couponPrefix
options.description: Prefix for generated codes. Not valid if coupon_code is specified.

options.name: description
options.description: Description of the coupon. This will be displayed in the Seller Dashboard.

options.name: expires
options.description: The coupon will expire on the date at 00:00:00 UTC

options.name: group
options.description: The name of the coupon group this coupon should be assigned to

options.name: numberOfCoupons
options.description: Number of coupons to generate. Not valid if coupon_code is specified.

options.name: recurring
options.description: If the coupon is used on subscription products, this indicates whether the discount should apply to recurring payments after the initial purchase

properties.name: productId
properties.description: The specific product/subscription ID

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: updateBy
properties.description: Either flat or percentage

properties.name: couponCode
properties.description: Identify the coupon to update

properties.name: group
properties.description: The name of the group of coupons you want to update

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Attributes in JSON form

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Number of times a coupon can be used in a checkout. This will be set to 999,999 by default, if not specified.

options.name: allowedUses
options.description: Number of times a coupon can be used in a checkout. This will be set to 999,999 by default, if not specified.

options.name: discount
options.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account

values.name: currency
values.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account

options.name: expires
options.description: The coupon will expire on the date at 00:00:00 UTC

options.name: newCouponCode
options.description: New code to rename the coupon to

options.name: newGroup
options.description: New group name to move coupon to

options.name: productIds
options.description: Comma-separated list of products e.g. 499531,1234,123546. If blank then remove associated products.

options.name: recurring
options.description: If the coupon is used on subscription products, this indicates whether the discount should apply to recurring payments after the initial purchase

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
